details.title: Stable-Member Mounted Instrument Environment Simulation Model Development
details.abstract: The equations of motion for the stable member of a threegimbal platform are presented [3]. These equations are combined with models of the three platform control loops to formulate a model for the system. The system model is simplified and a digital simulation is developed for studying the motion of the stable member under conditions of dynamic vehicle angular environment.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
